definitions.definition: Of cloth , clothing , furnishings , etc.: frayed and worn to an extent that the nap is damaged and the warp and weft threads show ; shabby , worn-out .

subdefinitions.definition: In poor condition ; damaged, shabby; also, poorly equipped or provided for, inadequate , meagre , scanty .
Of an argument , excuse , etc.: used so often that it is no longer effective or interesting ; banal , clichéd , trite .
An argument or assertion with little in the way of substance or supporting evidence .

definitions.definition: Of a person : wearing clothes of threadbare ( sense 1 ) material ; hence, impoverished , poor.

main_definition: Of cloth , clothing , furnishings , etc.: frayed and worn to an extent that the nap is damaged and the warp and weft threads show ; shabby , worn-out .
secondary_definitions: ( archaic or obsolete ) Of a person : wearing clothes of threadbare ( sense 1 ) material ; hence, impoverished , poor.
